overview:
taobao english agent is a group of persons who provide taobao shopping service to help other persons who live overseas to buy items from the biggest online market of China.

they provide the agent service with a fair agent service fee but better service quality, they have a website taobaoenglish.com have a automatic ordering system with real-time status updated. so customer can know the status of their orders in real-time, do not need check with their agents again and again, that’s really waste of time, at the same time the system will provide email alert to let you know your order’s status in time.

they start agent service since 2008, May , but the website build in 2010, Jul. so actually, they have well experience in taobao agent service field. just try to chat with them online and u will got more info.

register now in taobaoenglish.com will get 5USD reward, this event will closed on March. 31th. just go to register and have a nice shopping time.
